{
  "explanation": "The relevant purpose for recognizing the user's device and determining which Issuu documents have been read would fall under the purposes of 'Service Registration' (to keep track of user interactions and preferences) and 'Service Usage Analytics' (to analyze user document reading habits). Other potential purposes might include 'Account Management' (if tracking is tied to user accounts) and 'Provide Personalised Recommendations' if the information is used to suggest other documents.",

}
```
